word_cloud.display_name: Word cloud: Where are you from?
word_cloud.instructions: DHIS2 is a global community of users, and you will get the chance to learn with people from all over the world. Let’s create a word cloud and see where your peers come from. In the box below, write the name of your country. Please use full words and avoid using acronyms. After clicking “Save”, you will see the word cloud built from the answers from all course participants.
